cards.interpretation: Storm symbolizes a period of upheaval or intense emotions. It warns of turbulent times and advises finding strength to weather the challenges ahead.
Whisp represents fleeting moments of insight or inspiration. It suggests paying attention to subtle signs and messages from the universe.
Glowbug signifies illumination and the beauty of small wonders. It's a reminder to appreciate the little joys that light up your life.
Flow represents harmony, ease, and the natural progression of events. It suggests going with the current rather than resisting change.
Maze symbolizes confusion or feeling lost. It advises seeking clarity and finding a way through challenges with patience and determination.
Song represents self-expression, creativity, and emotional release. It encourages embracing your artistic side and using it as a form of healing.
Silk signifies elegance, sensuality, and luxury. It symbolizes refinement and encourages finding beauty and grace in every aspect of life.
Charm represents charisma and personal magnetism. It suggests using your charm and wit to influence situations positively.
Peace signifies inner tranquility and harmony. It indicates a time of calmness and advises seeking inner peace amidst external chaos.
Stone symbolizes stability and endurance. It suggests grounding yourself and relying on your inner strength to overcome challenges.
Sky represents boundless possibilities and spirituality. It signifies expansiveness and encourages exploring higher consciousness and aspirations.
Spark represents inspiration and potential. It suggests igniting your passion and ideas to bring about positive change in your life.
Scent signifies memories and intuition. It symbolizes heightened awareness and encourages trusting your instincts.
Shade represents mystery and the hidden aspects of life. It suggests exploring the unknown and embracing the shadows for growth.
Bloom symbolizes growth and new beginnings. It encourages embracing opportunities and allowing your potential to flourish.
Flame represents passion, transformation, and illumination. It advises channeling your energy into what sets your soul on fire.
Dusk symbolizes transition and reflection. It suggests a time of introspection and preparation for what lies ahead.
Tile represents structure and stability. It advises focusing on building a solid foundation in your endeavors.
Stream symbolizes the flow of emotions and life's journey. It encourages embracing change and going with the flow.
Wind represents movement, change, and freedom. It suggests embracing transformation and letting go of things that hold you back.
Ash symbolizes transformation and rebirth after a period of destruction. It suggests finding hope in challenging times.
Riddle represents mysteries and hidden knowledge. It encourages seeking answers to life's questions and embracing the enigmas of existence.
